input.sentences: this little guy was not ready to have his picture taken for his birthday .
my son made a great meal for everybody .
the little kids table was stocked full of goodies for all of them .
my granddaughter always knows when someone is about to take her picture .
i finally got a picture of all of them without them mugging for the camera .
output.sentences: My little guy is ready for his picture.
Grandpa watched my son, while I  made the evening meal.
The family meal included a kids and parents table, equally stocked with good food,.
This picture of Grandpa's favorite granddaughter shows how much fun the kids table really was.
Mugging for the camera was so much fun for the kids, I had to finally put the camera away.
